articles.title: DAA issues new advice to passengers due to fly out of Dublin Airport - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: The daa said those due to fly out on short-haul flights to Europe or the UK should arrive up to two and a half hours before departure.
articles.content:
AIRPORT OPERATOR DAA has revised its advice to passengers due to fly out of Dublin Airport.
A shortage of security screening staff has led to lengthy queues inside and outside the airport in recent … [+3304 chars]

articles.title: Puzzling outbreak of liver disease in kids spreads across Europe, US - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Some of the children in the UK have required specialist care at liver units and a few have needed a liver transplant.
articles.content:
London: Health officials say they have detected more cases of a mysterious liver disease in children that was first identified in Britain, with new infections spreading to Europe and the US.

articles.title: Lexus shows off RZ electric crossover ahead of global debut - Automotive News Europe

articles.title: Mysterious spike in hepatitis in children sees cases around Europe - Euronews
articles.description: Last week, health authorities warned countries to be on the alert following a spike in cases of hepatitis of unknown origin in children in the UK.
articles.content:

articles.title: Russia seeks medical equipment from India as war disrupts trade - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Russia is seeking more medical equipment from India after sanctions and logistical logjams following President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine have sharply reduced imports from Europe and China.
